data.name: Monster Energy Supercross 5 - Customization Pack Fire Storm
data.detailed_description:
Get the Customization Pack Fire Storm and set fire to your gaming experience with flaming hot contents.

It includes:
  • One helmet
  • One pair of boots
  • One suit
  • One pair of goggles
  • One livery
data.about_the_game:
Get the Customization Pack Fire Storm and set fire to your gaming experience with flaming hot contents.

It includes:
  • One helmet
  • One pair of boots
  • One suit
  • One pair of goggles
  • One livery
data.short_description: Get the Customization Pack Fire Storm and set fire to your gaming experience with hot elements for bikes and riders.

fullgame.name: Monster Energy Supercross - The Official Videogame 5

data.supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese - Brazil, Spanish - Latin America
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 Home (x64)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-8250U or AMD Ryzen 5 3400G or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce MX 150 (2048 VRAM) or Vega 11 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 Home (x64)
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-6700K or AMD FX-9590 or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 970 (4096 VRAM) or Radeon R9 390X (8192 VRAM) or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
